metadataAttributes.title: P6.3 The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures (including breaches) of personal information to meet the entityâ€™s objectives related to privacy
metadataAttributes.summary: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures - The entity creates and maintains a record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
